law.catch_line: When fiscal court may not establish.
law.text: When a county by a vote of its citizens, as provided in KRS 212.070 to 212.110, shall vote against creating, establishing and maintaining a county department of health, the department of health may not be created, established or maintained by resolution of its fiscal court until after the expiration of the terms of office of the members of the fiscal court who were members of the court when the election was held.
law.history: Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 301, sec. 14. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2054a-9.
